mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bubba by Sam Havens
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for Bubba by Sam Havens, Aug 31-Sep 18 | Mousetrap [by] Agatha Christie, Sep 21-28, Oct 2, 6-8, 11, 13, 15, 19, 21, 23 | Never Too Late, Sep 29- Oct 1, 4-5, 9, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 25-30.

Virginia
